40 
41 void swap(MixtureOptions& opt1, MixtureOptions& opt2)
42 {
43  std::swap(opt1.m_species_descriptor, opt2.m_species_descriptor);
44  std::swap(opt1.m_compositions, opt2.m_compositions);
45  std::swap(opt1.m_default_composition, opt2.m_default_composition);
46  //std::swap(opt1.m_has_default_composition, opt2.m_has_default_composition);
47  std::swap(opt1.m_source, opt2.m_source);
48  std::swap(opt1.m_state_model, opt2.m_state_model);
49  std::swap(opt1.m_thermo_db, opt2.m_thermo_db);
50  std::swap(opt1.m_mechanism, opt2.m_mechanism);
51  std::swap(opt1.m_viscosity, opt2.m_viscosity);
52  std::swap(opt1.m_thermal_conductivity, opt2.m_thermal_conductivity);
53  std::swap(opt1.m_gsi_mechanism, opt2.m_gsi_mechanism);
54 }

56 MixtureOptions::MixtureOptions()
57  : m_source()
58 {
59  setDefaultOptions();
60 }

62 MixtureOptions::MixtureOptions(const std::string& mixture)
63 {
64  loadFromFile(mixture);
65 }

67 MixtureOptions::MixtureOptions(const char* mixture)
68 {
69  loadFromFile(string(mixture));
70 }

72 MixtureOptions::MixtureOptions(IO::XmlElement& element)
73 {
74  loadFromXmlElement(element);
75 }

77 
78 void MixtureOptions::setDefaultOptions()
79 {
80  m_species_descriptor = "";
81  m_default_composition = -1;
82  m_source = "";
83  m_state_model = "ChemNonEq1T";
84  m_thermo_db = "RRHO";
85  m_mechanism = "none";
86  m_viscosity = "Chapmann-Enskog_LDLT";
87  m_thermal_conductivity = "Chapmann-Enskog_LDLT";
88  m_gsi_mechanism = "none";
89 }
90 
91 void MixtureOptions::loadFromFile(const string& mixture)
92 {
93  // Initalize to the default options
94  setDefaultOptions();
95 
96  // Get the mixture path on this computer.
97  m_source = databaseFileName(mixture, "mixtures");
98 
99  // Now load the XML file
100  IO::XmlDocument mixture_doc(m_source);
101  IO::XmlElement root = mixture_doc.root();
102 
103  // Now we can load from the mixture XmlElement
104  loadFromXmlElement(root);
105 }
106 
107 void MixtureOptions::loadFromXmlElement(IO::XmlElement& element)
108 {
109  if (element.tag() != "mixture")
110  element.parseError(
111  "XmlElement is not of 'mixture' type!");
112 
113  // Get the name of the mixture reaction mechanism
114  element.getAttribute("mechanism", m_mechanism, m_mechanism);
115 
116  // Get the type of thermodynamic database to use
117  element.getAttribute("thermo_db", m_thermo_db, m_thermo_db);
118 
119  // Get the viscosity algorithm
120  element.getAttribute("viscosity", m_viscosity, m_viscosity);
121 
122  // Get the thermal conductivity algorithm
123  element.getAttribute(
124  "thermal_conductivity", m_thermal_conductivity, m_thermal_conductivity);
125 
126  // Get the type of Gas-Surface Interaction for the wall
127  element.getAttribute("gsi_mechanism", m_gsi_mechanism, m_gsi_mechanism);
128 
129  // Get the state model
130  element.getAttribute("state_model", m_state_model, m_state_model);
131 
132  // Loop over all of the mixture child elements
133  IO::XmlElement::const_iterator iter;
134  for (iter = element.begin(); iter != element.end(); ++iter) {
135  // Load the species list
136  if (iter->tag() == "species")
137  m_species_descriptor = String::trim(iter->text());
138  else if (iter->tag() == "element_compositions")
139  loadElementCompositions(*iter);
140  }
141 }
142 
143 void MixtureOptions::loadElementCompositions(const IO::XmlElement& element)
144 {
145  // Load the compositions
146  IO::XmlElement::const_iterator comps = element.begin();
147  while (comps != element.end()) {
148  if (comps->tag() == "composition")
149  if (!addComposition(Composition(*comps)))
150  comps->parseError("Redefinition of a named composition!");
151  comps++;
152  }
153 
154  // Set the default composition
155  std::string name = "";
156  element.getAttribute("default", name, name);
157 
158  if (name != "") {
159  if (!setDefaultComposition(name))
160  element.parseError(
161  "Default composition does not match one of named compositions!");
162  }
163 }
164 
165 bool MixtureOptions::addComposition(const Composition& c, bool make_default)
166 {
167  // Check that this composition has a unique name
168  const int n = m_compositions.size();
169  for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
170  if (c.name() == m_compositions[i].name())
171  return false;
172 
173  m_compositions.push_back(c);
174  if (make_default)
175  m_default_composition = n;
176 
177  return true;
178 }
179 
180 bool MixtureOptions::setDefaultComposition(const std::string& name)
181 {
182  m_default_composition = -1;
183  for (int i = 0; i < m_compositions.size(); ++i) {
184  if (name == m_compositions[i].name()) {
185  m_default_composition = i;
186  break;
187  }
188  }
189 
190  return hasDefaultComposition();
191 }
192
